sentences.sContent: ...the case of an insurance company using multimedia to improve customer service in its branches.
sentences.sCn: …一家保险公司利用多媒体技术改善其分支机构的客户服务的实例。

trans.tranOther: You use multimedia to refer to computer programs and products which involve sound, pictures, and film, as well as text
involving computers and computer programs that use a mixture of sound, pictures, video, and writing to give information
